person.note: Meng(2) B [20708] According to Lou(2) Yue's [3624] funerary inscription for descendant, Song [1364] (q.v.), the ancestral home of the family was Kaifeng and B moved to Weizhou, Huixian and, later, the family moved back to Kaifeng. B's grandson, Yuan [20710], is listed as a Mingzhou (Hebei) resident, and CBD so lists the rest of the family--apparently based on their kinship with Yuan since the biography of great grandson, Zhonghou [8104], does not list a benguan and Mingzhou is not mentioned in the funerary inscriptions of descendants Dao [20717] or You [20715] as well as that of Song. I am assuming that Yuan moved to Mingzhou, whereas B's other grandson, Sui [20709], moved back to Kaifeng.
